content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. Though our characters' personal traits differ drastically from reality, regarding the discussed apartment in Munich city center, I aim to achieve the highest rental price possible. Let's focus solely on the price negotiation for now. Please propose your desired rental amount. If it aligns with my target, I'll agree with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Otherwise, I may continue looking for other means to optimize the agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a tenant seeking the lowest possible price, suggesting a higher amount goes against my objective. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
